subject: Programming
title: What Abstraction Means
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on What Abstraction Means.

hook.text: You drive a car without knowing how the engine works. That's abstraction in action.

buildup.text: Abstraction hides complexity behind a simple interface. You interact with the steering wheel, not pistons.

discovery.text: Computers are built in layers: hardware, OS, libraries, applications. Each hides the one below.

twist.text: Leaky abstractions break the illusion. Sometimes the hidden layer's behavior bleeds through.

climax.text: Great software engineers know when to trust the abstraction and when to peek underneath.

punchline.text: Simplicity on top hides complexity below.

quiz.question: What does abstraction do in computing?
options: Hides complexity behind a simple interface
